title: Hua Jiang Hu: Bu Liang Ren
synopsis: Two martial artists are brutally killed by a team of assassins, leaving their wards, a young boy and girl, defenseless. A martial arts master dispatches of the assassins, sparing their lives, and decides to take them in. He raises them and teaches them martial arts.
related_anime: ['Hua Jiang Hu Zhi Bu Liang Ren season1 recap movies', 'Hua Jianghu: Xia Lan', 'Hua Jianghu: Huan Shi Men Sheng', 'Hua Jianghu: Bei Mo Ting', 'Hua Jianghu: Ling Zhu', 'Hua Jianghu Richang Pian', 'Hua Jiang Hu: Bu Liang Ren II']
characters: ['Ji, Ru Xue', 'Lu, Lin Xuan', 'Zhang, Zi Fan', 'Li, Xing Yun']
